item.title: 49: Cheating, the mind of a cheater and debunking 'once a cheater always a cheater' with The Angry Therapist John Kim! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do the Work, Sabrina is joined by LMFT John Kim to talk about cheaters, cheating,debunking the myth 'once a cheater always a cheater' and how to move on from someone who cheated on you. Want to work with John? HERE! Want to work with Sabrina? HERE! Dont forget to follow Sabrina and Do the Work on instagram and Sabrina on Tik tok! Please support our sponsors!

item.title: 46: Stepping into your power and how to show up for yourself and your partner in dating! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do The Work, Sabrina talks about stepping into your power, what that looks like, how to etc and the importance of showing up for your partner in the same ways you want them to show up for you. item.title: 45: From Fboy to securely attached, debunking ‘if he wanted to he would,' ‘ sleeping with them will ruin things’ and more with Eli Vazquez! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do the Work podcast, Sabrina is joined by Eli Vazquez to chat about how Eli went from a F-boy to securely attached, debunking myths like 'if he wanted to he would', when to sleep together with someone, fear of commitment, breakups not being personal and SO much more!! Follow Eli on TIK TOK or work with him HERE! Want to work with Sabrina? HERE!

item.title: 44: BONUS EPISODE! How human design can help understand you and others, how to navigate dating and understand yourself deeper with Erin Claire Jones! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks bonus episode of Do the Work Podcast, Sabrina is joined by Erin Claire Jones , founder of Human Blueprint to chat about how human design can help understand you and others, how to navigate dating and understand yourself deeper and how to interpret your human design to help your dating life! A bit more about Erin and human design- Human Design is a synthesis of ancient wisdom and modern science that sheds light on a person’s energetic makeup, as well as specific tools they can use to live at their happiest, healthiest, highest potential.

item.title: 43: When and how to define the relationship, “what are we” conversation and milestones in dating! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do the Work, Sabrina talks solo about when and how to define the relationship, “what are we” conversation and milestones in dating! She answers questions like: Timeline to date before committing? Insecure in relationship vs single? How to figure out which to pick when dating multiple people? and so much more! item.title: 24: Ep. 24 'Doing the work' and what healing looks like with Leo Skepi! | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of 'do the work' podcast Leo Skepi and I engage in authentic conversations about personal growth, resilience, and empowerment. We discuss the unique challenges faced by LGBTQ+ individuals, including societal norms, discrimination, and stigma. What 'doing the work' looks like to me and Leo as well as the toxicity in the Gay community. Transcript

item.title: 23: Ep. 23 Attachment styles with therapist Flynn Skidmore | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description Sabrina and Therapist Flynn Skidmore provide valuable insights and practical strategies for listeners seeking to deepen their understanding of attachment styles and their impact on relationships. Through engaging discussions and real-life examples, they explore the complexities of attachment patterns and guide listeners towards developing healthier, more secure connections. "Do the Work" offers a safe and supportive space for individuals to explore their own attachment styles, gain self-awareness, and discover practical tools for growth.

item.title: 22: Ep 22. Mindset and dating with Case Kenny | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do The Work, Sabrina chats with Case Kenny to go over how mindset affects dating and the importance of doing the work on yourself to show up the best you can in dating! Buy Case Book here! Transcript

item.title: 15: Ep 15. Masha pt 3 How your anxiety and patterns in dating are playing out and what does the process of growth and change really look like? | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode, Sabrina is joined by Masha for a part 3 of our nervous system and anxiety talk! This week the girls chat about how your anxiety and patterns in dating are playing out in other areas of your life. What does the process of growth and change really look like? How your fears and insecurities play out in other areas of your life besides dating, why your nervous system hates change, and what 'doing the work' actually looks like.

item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode of Do The Work, Sabrina Is joined by Manoj Dias the Co-Founder of Open. item.description: Podcast Description This week Sabrina opens up about her inner child healing journey, how ketamine treatments helped her connect to 'little sab' and what reparenting your inner child looks like. Want to work with Sabrina? Click here! Transcript

item.description: Podcast Description This week Sabrina is joined by her big brother Joe who is also a dating coach and here to spill the tea! item.title: 3: Ep. 3 What does ' do the work' mean? | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description On this weeks episode Sabrina dives into what it means to 'do the work' on yourself. Finding your core wounds and traumas, reparenting the littler you and how to date differently once you've healed. Transcript

item.title: 2: Ep 2. Texting in Dating | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description This week Sabrina is back with a HOT topic: Texting in dating. She goes over the dos and donts with texting in the talking and dating phase, how to work and sit through your anxiety/anxious attachment with texting and try something new! Transcript

item.title: 1: Ep 1. Anxious attachment and how it manifests in relationships | Do The Work
item.description: Podcast Description Welcome to the first episode of Do The Work podcast! On this episode, Sabrina shares her journey with anxiety, anxious attachment style, and ways she healed it and how to 'do the work' authentically. Transcript
